extendedInfo.description: Camera 2 is the ultimate real-time effects app.Take better pictures, amazing videos and have fun creating them.Featuring many unique high quality effects, grouped into families sharing a common theme:â Old Time: make your camera look like something from the 20's, 40's, 50's, 60's, 70's or 80'sâ Lomos and Retro: everyone's favourite, from normal to sublime.â Comic: to express yourself, half tone, B&W, printed comics, new style, mix and matchâ Art: sometimes you just want to create a piece of art with a tapâ Sci-Fi: see it to believe itâ Computer: and finally, for every geek or nerd out there, this is unmissable. Old computer monitorsMany of the effects can be boosted by applying a superb "out of focus"/"depth of field" filter, and, as usual, it's all real time.Main features:â Capture high resolution photos with effectsâ Capture video with effects (*)â Apply the effects to your existing photos tooâ Share your creations straight from the appâ More than 25 high quality effectsâ Tweak each effect to achieve your own unique lookâ Animated effects(*) Video recording requires that your device supports NEON instructions, most modern devices do.CUSTOM ROMSâ Camera 2 doesn't officially support custom ROMs. The app might work, but there are know issues especially with CyanogenMod. Please update to an official ROM or ask us for a refund if you purchased the app.FAQâ Why does the video recorder launch the default camera recording app?- This happens only when taking unfiltered videos because it is faster, for videos with effects the camera 2 recorder is used.â How can I see the pictures I've taken with Camera 2?- For now you can only see the last picture/video you've created within the app, we plan to add a fully featured gallery but for the time being you will have to use the standard gallery app to see all pictures.â Zoom doesn't work on the preview of my device why?- Try the Software Zoom option in the settings, this might fix the problem.POLICIESIf you are unhappy with the app please contact us to our support email we'll try to either fix the problem or give you a full refund.Feel free to contact us if you want to share your feedback or experience.Finally, Camera 2 does not store/collect/send/manage any personal data, all photos and videos taken with Camera 2 are solely yours and yours only. PERMISSIONSInternet: only required to share your pictures. If you don't share, internet won't be used.Microphone: only to record audio with your videos, no other use.Location: only used to store location to your photos, it's disabled by default and it's optional.LEGALThis software uses code of FFmpeg licensed under the  LGPLv2.1 and its source can be downloaded here: jfdplabs.com/ffmpeg

reviews.title: Beautiful camera app for only 99 cents
reviews.comment: I am glad I purchased this app.  I have a Samsung galaxy note 2 (i317) android ver 4.1.2.  This app rocks!   The timely responses by the devs is why i decided to try it! Thanks!
reviews.author: M Kneeland

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Wow what an awesome app! Well worth the money. Exactly what I was looking for and more. High quality effects clean easy interface. Download! You will not be disappointed. For those of you on instagram and wanting to upload your video with effects, I recomend you download \'video converter android\' to convert them to MP3. Then you can upload your lovely videos to instagram @jubiejoooo
reviews.author: Jennifer Jane

reviews.title: Brilliant\342\200\246\342\200\246 .
reviews.comment: Does exactly as it says. Works 100% on samsung galaxy note 10.1 jb 4.1.2 50p,  while on sale,  what a bargain.
reviews.author: Barra Dos

reviews.title: fLimited Functionality FTW...
reviews.comment: 99\302\242 for an alternative video recorder that records THE MATRIX effects without using the stock video recorder = WIN.  Inability to delete anything from within the app (i.e., the sole previewable pic/video) = FTL.  However, if you find the Import/Open File icon, you can launch File Commander, etc., and delete files.   Short of switching back-and-forth between two apps, Importing Files was the only backhanded way I found to \"preview\" other pics/videos while in-app.  Needs configurable bells and whistles! D:
reviews.author: Andrew Yee

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This is fantastic, only having a few issues with it shutting down once I have taken a photo. Other than that, brilliant.
reviews.author: Christopher Woods

reviews.title: Just ok
reviews.comment: Nice interface but needs a lot more filters and settings.
reviews.author: George Kamperis

reviews.title: Still need more filters~
reviews.comment: Effects are quite cool~ I like the latest Hope effect. However, still need more filters. And of course, please consider to redesign the interface.
reviews.author: Terrence Then

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I like this app, especially fx for video. Very recomended for hipster..haha..just kidding bro.
reviews.author: Muhamad Safar

reviews.title: Great camera, but...[edited]
reviews.comment: Needs a way to save to external SD card....  [Edit]  Awesome!!! You added in the option to save to SD... Now I wish I could add a 6th star to this app!
reviews.author: Tony Gultice

reviews.title: I\'m shocked.....!!!!!
reviews.comment: I really can\'t speak, this is what I was waiting for its amazing......great job.
reviews.author: Sofian Al-Shooshi

reviews.title: Really great user interface...
reviews.comment: ... just would like some more filters but the ones now are very good and original. Would like to see the zoom implemented subtlety on screen, and then give the app option to use volume keys to snap photos instead. Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Adam Rodriguez

reviews.title: Just a couple filters, nothing special
reviews.comment: Just a couple filters representing different eras in photography. Nothing greatly astonishing. Get more of a blood rush with most free photo apps ...
reviews.author: Jonathan Castaneda

reviews.title: good, but 80\'s effect doesn\'t work on Samsung S4
reviews.comment: for a cell phone app, it works good. I have a vertical line when I use the 80\'s effect. Everything else works fine. I wished they would let me save the pictures locally, just like the built-in Camera. the way it is now, I can to take picture and transfer them before taking the second picture. They overwrite each other.  Update: 7/12  looks like I was wrong and the vertical line is by design and configurable. this is to simulate the old VHS effect. Clever ;-)
reviews.author: kayvon Sadeghi

reviews.title: Not bad could be improved upon
reviews.comment: Video and camera filters are great! But, for a pay app we should be able to save videos as actual video files and not as web files. Would also be nice to be able share videos on facebook as well as other media options. Very limited at the moment.
reviews.author: Casey Goodwin

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Love the camera so far. Running AOKP on AT&T S3. Have had no crashes due to effects.   I have no worries if this app would fail, because devs seem to provide support for those running roms. Awesome!
reviews.author: Donald Weir

reviews.title: Images are being deleted
reviews.comment: On s3 images and folder seem to disappear or get deleted
reviews.author: Salti Awwad

reviews.title: A camera that\'s on par with the I phone camera effects
reviews.comment: Finally an excellent camera app that offers amazing detail and depth to my pictures. In my opinion I\'d lose the video option and make room for some more darkroom effects. Fantastic application.
reviews.author: Jason Kingston
